723804f-a.title: Manhattan: Wadsworth Avenue - 178th Street
723804f-a.text:
Universalist Church, Wadsworth Avenue at S.W. corner of 178th
Street. This edifice was erected some time around 1920.
May 27, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
The New York Times of January 1, 1939 reports the sale of this
edifice by the Universalist General Convention of Boston to the
Mission Church, a Norwegian Lutheran Congregational body.

723805f-a.title: Manhattan: Wadsworth Avenue - 178th Street (West)
723805f-a.text:
109-113 Wadsworth Ave., at the N.E. corner of West 178th Street, show-
ing the synagogue of the Congregation of Mount Sinai Anshei Emeth.
May 27, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
